item.title: Earl Crush
item.description: Listen, I’ve just about sworn off m/f romance after so many recent flops, but this one snuck in under the wire, as I was already committed to the ARC. It’s good! Not amazing, but good, in the fulfilled-the-brief, let’s-not-overthink-it kind of way I’ve been looking for [[digest/books of august ’24|since August]].
